mapper.select: SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo ,l.lecture_name lectureName ,a.member_id memberId ,s.student_name studentName ,attend_date attendDate ,attend_status attendStatus ,attend_reason attendReason ,attend_create_date attendCreateDate ,attend_update_date attendUpdateDate FROM attend a INNER JOIN lecture l ON a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no RIGHT JOIN student s ON a.member_id = s.member_id WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND a.attend_date = #{attendDate} ORDER BY s.student_name

SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo ,l.lecture_name lectureName ,attend_date attendDate ,attend_status attendStatus ,attend_reason attendReason ,attend_create_date attendCreateDate ,attend_update_date attendUpdateDate FROM attend a INNER JOIN lecture l ON a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE l.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY a.attend_date DESC

SELECT l.lecture_no lectureNo ,l.lecture_name lectureName ,a.member_id memberId ,s.student_name studentName ,attend_date attendDate ,attend_status attendStatus ,attend_reason attendReason ,attend_create_date attendCreateDate ,attend_update_date attendUpdateDate FROM attend a INNER JOIN student s ON a.member_id = s.member_id INNER JOIN lecture l ON a.lecture_no = l.lecture_no WHERE a.member_id = #{memberId} AND a.attend_date =#{attendDate} AND a.lecture_no = #{lectureNo}

SELECT s.member_id memberId , s.student_name studentName , sl.lecture_no lectureNo ,l.lecture_name lectureName FROM student s INNER JOIN student_lecture sl ON sl.member_id = s.member_id AND sl.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} INNER JOIN lecture l ON sl.lecture_no = l.lecture_no AND sl.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} WHERE s.member_id NOT IN( SELECT a.member_id FROM attend a WHERE a.lecture_no = #{lectureNo} AND a.attend_date =#{attendDate} )
